title: Free the artist
tags: how to unlock free the artist
content:
's Gate, he'd fled his engagement to her. Brem agreed to sell us Oskar for a hefty sum of gold. It took some convincing, but we got Brem to lower the price. We bought Oskar from the Zhentarim. We should tell him the good news. We killed the Zhentarim near Oskar. Probably wise to leave while we can. We told Oskar we'd rescue him. Now to figure out how. We persuaded the Zhentarim that Oskar was more trouble than he was worth. They let him go.

Look for Oskar in Baldur's Gate

Oskar left for Baldur
